1.title: Adam Meets the Porsche 935 - Race Day 1

episode of.title: Going Racing with Adam Carolla (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: It's day one of the 2018 Goodwood Festival of Speed. Adam Carolla travels across the pond to race Paul Newman's Le Mans winning Porsche 935 in the Woodstock of cars. Will the comedian ace the first run or will he burn out on the flint wall?

2.title: Kevin Estre's Le Mans Winning Porsche 911

episode of.title: Going Racing with Adam Carolla (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Adam meets up with 2018 Le Mans winner Kevin Estre to discuss the ins and outs of endurance racing, and has a difficult time understanding that drivers can't drink for the 24 hours these races can take.

3.title: John Surtees' Championship Winning Ferrari

episode of.title: Going Racing with Adam Carolla (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Adam talks with automotive historian Lee Clark of the Barber Vintage Motorsports Museum about legendary driver John Surtees' championship winning Ferrari that drove at this year's Goodwood.

4.title: The McLaren 600LT

episode of.title: Going Racing with Adam Carolla (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Joined by Darren Goddard of McLaren Automotive, Adam learns what goes in to making a supercar that's safe, sexy, and able to go 0-60 in 2.8 seconds. Adam then repays the favor by teaching his British friend a lesson in American history.

5.title: Battery Trouble - Race Day 2

episode of.title: Going Racing with Adam Carolla (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Adam Carolla prepares for his last race at Goodwood. But the battery in his legendary Porsche has suddenly gone dead and his team didn't bring a spare. Will Adam get his car to the race on time, or will he have to sit out his last run?

6.title: Bill Goldberg Crashes his Florence Capital Toyota

episode of.title: Going Racing with Adam Carolla (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: WWE's Bill Goldberg shows up at the Goodwood Festival of Speed and races a NASCAR truck. Things are going well for Goldberg until they are not - and he CRASHES.

7.title: Aftermath: Bill "Hay Bale" Goldberg

episode of.title: Going Racing with Adam Carolla (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: WWE's Bill Goldberg deals with the fall-out after crashing his NASCAR Truck at the Goodwood Festival of Speed. Some nicknames we get to pick, others we don't.

1.title: Adam's 600 HP Nissan 300ZX Turbo

episode of.title: Going Racing with Adam Carolla (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Adam Carolla goes to the Goodwood Festival of Speed to race up the famous hill in his Nissan 300ZX race car --once owned by Paul Newman -- and check out the sights, sounds and madness of "the Woodstock of cars."

2.title: 1500+ hp Porsche 917/30

episode of.title: Going Racing with Adam Carolla (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Adam gets the lowdown on one of the most insane racing cars in the history of motorsports: The Porsche 917/30 Can Am race car, whose flat 12 could turn out 1,580 horsepower at full boost. Only drivers with massive titanium cojones could race this one.

3.title: First Goodwood Run After McLaren P1

episode of.title: Going Racing with Adam Carolla (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Adam takes his first run up the hill at the Goodwood Festival of speed in his Nissan 300ZX Turbo race car. Of course, it HAD to be right after a McLaren P1, one of the fastest cars at Goodwood. Figures.

4.title: Ford GT Racecars and Marino Franchitti

episode of.title: Going Racing with Adam Carolla (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Adam gets the story on modern and vintage Ford GT race cars from Ford Chip Ganassi Racing driver Marino Franchitti, who helped bring the Ford GT back to sports car racing at Le Mans and FIA World Endurance Challenge.

5.title: Jaguar XJ13 Concept and D-Type

episode of.title: Going Racing with Adam Carolla (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Adam checks out a couple of priceless Jaguars -- a one-off, V12-powered XJ13 concept car from 1966, and a 1956 D-Type race car at the "Woodstock of vintage cars," the Goodwood Festival of Speed.

6.title: Adam's Final Runs in the Nissan 300ZX

episode of.title: Going Racing with Adam Carolla (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Adam makes his final run up the hill at the "Woodstock of vintage cars," the Goodwood Festival of Speed. Will it rain a lot or a little?

7.title: Keanu Reeves and Arch Motorcycle Co.

episode of.title: Going Racing with Adam Carolla (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: Adam meets Keanu Reeves at Goodwood Festival of Speed and talks two wheels, the actor's new motorcycle company Arch Motorcycle Company with co-founder Gard Hollinger, and whatever else Keanu feels like sharing about his "production custom motorcycles."

imdb.title: Going Racing with Adam Carolla
akas: Going Racing with Adam Carolla (United States)
plot: Adam Carolla takes the viewer on a hilarious tour of the most exhilarating vintage car races around the world.
